instructions:
Cook beans, drain and set aside. In a small saucepan sauté the onion and garlic in melted butter until
tender but not brown. Add salami *(or bacon)*, vinegar, parsley and pepper. Heat and stir for a minute. Add
beans and heat through. Serves 4.
ingredients: 1 pkg (10 oz) frozen Italian style green beans
1 oz hard salami, sliced and chopped (or 4 slices bacon fried and crumbled)
name: Italian Beans Au Vinaigrette
